snippet.title: The Chewllers
snippet.description: The Chewllers is a multiplayer, VR game. The project presents stylized and comic nature, where 4 players protect the tower from monsters in Co-op mode. Evil creatures in this world are destroying everything they can chew. The main goal of the four players is to withstand the attacks of the "Chewllers". Players can fight against monsters in different ways. They are able to create their own crafted tools or use already existing explosive devices. We have many kinds of monsters with different abilities, each of them needs an appropriate approach to defeat. Defeating the Bluggers depends on the team and the creativity of the players.
